Some Lesser Known Facts About Dimpy Ganguli

Does Dimpy Ganguli smoke?: Not Known

Does Dimpy Ganguli drink alcohol?: Yes

In 2007, she participated in the beauty pageant ‘Sananda Tilottama’ and became the second runner-up.

In 2008, she participated in the reality show- ‘Bigg Boss’ Season 8.

She also participated in the Gladrags MegaModel & Manhunt contest in 2009.

She got married to Rahul Mahajan on the reality show, ‘Rahul Dulhaniya Le Jayega’, in 2010.

In 2010, she took part in the reality game show ‘Zor Ka Jhatka: Total Wipeout.’

In 2011, Dimpy made a breakthrough with the role of Naagin in the TV serial- ‘Kahani Chandrakanta Ki.’

She, along with her ex-husband, Rahul Mahajan participated in the dance reality show ‘Nach Baliye’ Season 5 (2012-2013).
